{{Wired embedded system |brand=Silver Peak |model=Unity EdgeConnect |revision=EC-XS |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lanner |manuf_model=FW-7551A |manuf_rev=-SV1 |est_release_date=12/2015 |type=SD-WAN Router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=C2358 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 GiB |fla1_brand=Wintec |fla1_model=CF card |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q64JVSIQ |ram1=8 GiB |ram1_brand=Wintec |ram1_model=WD3SE808G16NSE-SPK |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1543 |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WGI211AT (x2) |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=LPC I/O Controller;Winbond;W83627DHG;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, 256K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25256B;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, ATA to Serial ATA Bi-direction Bridge;Sunplus Tech;SPIF223A;;1;,,, 3+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95831;;1;,,, 3V 16Mbit Serial Flash Memory w/ SPI;Winbond;W25Q16DVSFIG;;2;,,, Clock Generator for Intel microServers;Renesas;9VRS4420D;;1;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;1;,,, Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS3669S;;3 ;,,, Single-Phase D-CAP Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51518;;1;,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51225;;1;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87350Q5D;;1;,,, Single-Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51219;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7620S;;2;,,, 30V, 14.5A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6673BZ;;2;,,, 30V, 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7694;;2;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, 3A LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9018A;;4;, |flags=RTC w/ battery, buzzer, power switch, metal case, heatsink, fan |stock_boot=Grub;0.97;; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.38.6-rc1; |default_ip=169.254.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:1B:BC }} {{TagLine|SD-WAN Branch Gateway}} :[https://www.silver-peak.com/sites/default/files/infoctr/spec_sheet_edgeconnect_xs.pdf Spec. Sheet]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2358 @1.7GHz (Dual-Core) *Memory: 8GB DDR3 ECC (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 2GB WinTec CompactFlash :8MB CMOS Serial Flash, 120GB SATA 3.0 SSD *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:EdgeConnect EC-XS Top.jpeg|Board Top File:EdgeConnect EC-XS Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:EdgeConnect EC-XS Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
